_components._N$string:
Balancing the number of atoms of an element in the
compound that contains the maximum number of atoms
is most convenient.

_components._string: Balancing the number of atoms of an element in the
_components._N$string: Balancing the number of atoms of an element in the

_components._string: compound that contains the maximum number of atoms
_components._N$string: compound that contains the maximum number of atoms

To balance, one cannot alter the formulae but can only
alter the number of atoms or molecules.
